trans-unit.source: Converts instances of other types to and from instances of a <see cref="T:System.Double" /> that represent an object's length.
trans-unit.target: Converte instâncias de outros tipos de e para instâncias de um <see cref="T:System.Double" /> que representa o comprimento do objeto.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.LengthConverter> supports conversion to and from the following types: <xref:System.String>, <xref:System.Decimal>, <xref:System.Single>, <xref:System.Double>, <xref:System.Int16>, <xref:System.Int32>, <xref:System.Int64>, <xref:System.UInt16>, <xref:System.UInt32>, and <xref:System.UInt64>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.LengthConverter> oferece suporte à conversão de e para os seguintes tipos: <xref:System.String>, <xref:System.Decimal>, <xref:System.Single>, <xref:System.Double>, <xref:System.Int16>, <xref:System.Int32>, <xref:System.Int64>, <xref:System.UInt16>, <xref:System.UInt32>, e <xref:System.UInt64>.

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to create and use an instance of the <xref:System.Windows.LengthConverter> object.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir mostra como criar e usar uma instância de <xref:System.Windows.LengthConverter> objeto.

trans-unit.source: A custom method called `ChangeLeft` is defined, which converts the content of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBoxItem> (defined in a separate [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)] file) to an instance of <xref:System.Double>, and later into a <xref:System.String>.
trans-unit.target: Um método personalizado chamado `ChangeLeft` for definida, que converte o conteúdo de um <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBoxItem> (definido em um separado [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)] arquivo) para uma instância de <xref:System.Double>e posteriormente em um <xref:System.String>.

trans-unit.source: This method passes the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBoxItem> to a <xref:System.Windows.LengthConverter> object, which converts the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBoxItem> <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.Content%2A> to an instance of <xref:System.Double>.
trans-unit.target: Esse método passa o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBoxItem> para um <xref:System.Windows.LengthConverter> objeto, que converte o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBoxItem> <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.Content%2A> para uma instância de <xref:System.Double>.

trans-unit.source: Notice that this value has already been converted to a <xref:System.String> by using the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Control.ToString%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Observe que esse valor já foi convertido em um <xref:System.String> usando o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Control.ToString%2A> método.

trans-unit.source: This value is then passed back to the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Canvas.SetLeft%2A> method and the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Canvas.GetLeft%2A> method of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Canvas> in order to change the position of the `text1` object.
trans-unit.target: Este valor é então passado para o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Canvas.SetLeft%2A> método e o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Canvas.GetLeft%2A> método o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Canvas> para alterar a posição do `text1` objeto.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.LengthConverter" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Windows.LengthConverter" />.

trans-unit.source: Provides contextual information about a component.
trans-unit.target: Fornece informações contextuais sobre um componente.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the data type to evaluate for conversion.
trans-unit.target: Identifica o tipo de dados a ser avaliado para conversão.

trans-unit.source: Determines whether conversion is possible from a specified type to a <see cref="T:System.Double" /> that represents an object's length.
trans-unit.target: Determina se é possível realizar a conversão de um tipo especificado para um <see cref="T:System.Double" /> que representa o tamanho de um objeto.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if conversion is possible; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> se a conversão for possível; caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.LengthConverter> supports conversion to and from the following types: <xref:System.String>, <xref:System.Decimal>, <xref:System.Single>, <xref:System.Double>, <xref:System.Int16>, <xref:System.Int32>, <xref:System.Int64>, <xref:System.UInt16>, <xref:System.UInt32>, and <xref:System.UInt64>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.LengthConverter> oferece suporte à conversão de e para os seguintes tipos: <xref:System.String>, <xref:System.Decimal>, <xref:System.Single>, <xref:System.Double>, <xref:System.Int16>, <xref:System.Int32>, <xref:System.Int64>, <xref:System.UInt16>, <xref:System.UInt32>, e <xref:System.UInt64>.

trans-unit.source: Provides contextual information about a component.
trans-unit.target: Fornece informações contextuais sobre um componente.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the data type to evaluate for conversion.
trans-unit.target: Identifica o tipo de dados a ser avaliado para conversão.

trans-unit.source: Determines whether conversion is possible to a specified type from a <see cref="T:System.Double" /> that represents an object's length.
trans-unit.target: Determina se é possível realizar a conversão de um <see cref="T:System.Double" /> que representa o tamanho de um objeto para um tipo especificado.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if conversion to the <paramref name="destinationType" /> is possible; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> se a conversão para <paramref name="destinationType" /> for possível; caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.LengthConverter> supports conversion of the following types: <xref:System.String>, <xref:System.Decimal>, <xref:System.Single>, <xref:System.Double>, <xref:System.Int16>, <xref:System.Int32>, <xref:System.Int64>, <xref:System.UInt16>, <xref:System.UInt32>, and <xref:System.UInt64>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.LengthConverter> oferece suporte à conversão dos seguintes tipos: <xref:System.String>, <xref:System.Decimal>, <xref:System.Single>, <xref:System.Double>, <xref:System.Int16>, <xref:System.Int32>, <xref:System.Int64>, <xref:System.UInt16>, <xref:System.UInt32>, e <xref:System.UInt64>.

trans-unit.source: Provides contextual information about a component.
trans-unit.target: Fornece informações contextuais sobre um componente.

trans-unit.source: Represents culture-specific information that is maintained during a conversion.
trans-unit.target: Representa informações específicas a uma cultura que são mantidas durante uma conversão.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the object that is being converted to <see cref="T:System.Double" />.
trans-unit.target: Identifica o objeto que está sendo convertido em <see cref="T:System.Double" />.

trans-unit.source: Converts instances of other data types into instances of <see cref="T:System.Double" /> that represent an object's length.
trans-unit.target: Converte instâncias de outros tipos de dados para instâncias de <see cref="T:System.Double" /> que representam o tamanho do objeto.

trans-unit.source: An instance of <see cref="T:System.Double" /> that is the value of the conversion.
trans-unit.target: Uma instância de <see cref="T:System.Double" /> que é o valor da conversão.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.LengthConverter> supports conversion of the following types: <xref:System.String>, <xref:System.Decimal>, <xref:System.Single>, <xref:System.Double>, <xref:System.Int16>, <xref:System.Int32>, <xref:System.Int64>, <xref:System.UInt16>, <xref:System.UInt32>, <xref:System.UInt64>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.LengthConverter> oferece suporte à conversão dos seguintes tipos: <xref:System.String>, <xref:System.Decimal>, <xref:System.Single>, <xref:System.Double>, <xref:System.Int16>, <xref:System.Int32>, <xref:System.Int64>, <xref:System.UInt16>, <xref:System.UInt32>, <xref:System.UInt64>.

trans-unit.source: Occurs if the <paramref name="source" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre se o <paramref name="source" /> é <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: Occurs if the <paramref name="source" /> is not <see langword="null" /> and is not a valid type for conversion.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre se o <paramref name="source" /> não é <see langword="null" /> e não é um tipo válido para conversão.

trans-unit.source: Describes context information of a component, such as its container and <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor" />.
trans-unit.target: Descreve as informações de contexto de um componente como seu contêiner e <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor" />.

trans-unit.source: Identifies culture-specific information, including the writing system and the calendar that is used.
trans-unit.target: Identifica as informações específicas a uma cultura, incluindo o sistema de escrita e o calendário que é usado.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="T:System.Object" /> that is being converted.
trans-unit.target: Identifica o <see cref="T:System.Object" /> que está sendo convertido.

trans-unit.source: The data type that this instance of <see cref="T:System.Double" /> is being converted to.
trans-unit.target: O tipo de dados para o qual esta instância de <see cref="T:System.Double" /> está sendo convertida.

trans-unit.source: Converts other types into instances of <see cref="T:System.Double" /> that represent an object's length.
trans-unit.target: Converte outros tipos em instâncias de <see cref="T:System.Double" /> que representam o tamanho de um objeto.

trans-unit.source: A new <see cref="T:System.Object" /> that is the value of the conversion.
trans-unit.target: Um novo <see cref="T:System.Object" /> que é o valor da conversão.

trans-unit.source: Occurs if the <paramref name="value" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre se o <paramref name="value" /> é <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: Occurs if the <paramref name="value" /> is not <see langword="null" /> and is not a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Brush" />, or the <paramref name="destinationType" /> is not valid.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre se o <paramref name="value" /> não é <see langword="null" /> e não é um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Brush" /> ou então se o <paramref name="destinationType" /> não é válido.
